name: Doodle Taxi
description:
WELCOME TO THE MAGICAL WORLD OF DOODLE TAXI


Do you miss good old days? No loot boxes, no micro transactions, no season passes?

Get ready for a Zen-like experience
Doodle Taxi's main thing is being a chill taxi driving simulator game. Of course there is a little gimmick and story on top of that. But that doesn't change this game meant to blow off some steam. If you don't want to invest hours to start enjoying a game, this one what you have been looking for. Enjoy this beautiful world as you cruise around and color it in! Whether you want to drive around like a maniac or just chill out and listen to the bumping soundtrack, this is a great pick up and play driving game!


A GOOFY STORY


What's the worst thing that could happen to a modern day Taxi Driver? Not getting paid? Get mugged? No. A cabbie can get cursed by a witch and lose his sight. Just because we live in a modern day, do you really think that witches were extinct? Well I was thinking the same thing, so I thought that might be a good story to put in my game.

WHAT THE CAR!?


This is a car game obviously. And we should have cars, more than one. Unlockable, locked behind some in-game currency. But don't worry, you can earn all these without spending real money. I can't design these complex loot boxes and in-app purchases anyway.

SHORT STORY, LONG


Ok I know this is not an expression. At least this is not correct one. But I wanted to point out that this game is a pretty short experience compared to others. Of course you can play forever, there is a high replayability. But playthrough will be pretty short.

A BANGER SOUNDTRACK

When I say banger soundtrack, be sure that I'm telling truth. I'm so glad that so many talented indie musicians donated their awesome songs into this one, including;
Abstraction / Cat Temper / Obsidian Contraption / Colourful Energy / Dragon-Orb / Vercin Featherix / No Lake / Nelson & Bernstein / SparraLIMB

Wrapping up
So drive your car fast and careful, keep that 'being a good driver' meter at green, deliver customers on time. That's the name of the game. Thanks for reading so far and I wish you to enjoy my little game.
